description: The finest quality

Unlike inferior dessert cups, these premium 5 oz hard plastic cups from KM are made from the highest grade materials. With meticulous craftsmanship and attention to detail, the KM set of 100 parfait cups are second to none.

Spoons and lids included

KM mini dessert cups come complete with 100 dessert spoons and resealable plastic lids, meaning our 5 oz plastic cups help keep food tasting fresh and also guard against germs. Each one of our small clear plastic cups has a 2.25” top width, a 1.5” bottom width and is 3” high.
Reusable

Say goodbye to single use disposable dessert cups. These mini plastic cups are made from tough material, meaning that they can be easily washed for use over and over again. For dessert cups with spoons that are kinder to Mother Nature, choose only KM clear dessert cups.
Manufacturer guarantee
If you don’t love your mini cups for desserts, simply return your plastic parfait cups and we’ll refund you. No fuss,
no tricks
